moves.4... Bc5: Rather than exchange Knights immediately, which would centralize White's Queen, I play to develop and pressure the Knight.
moves.5. c3: Securely guards the Knight but impedes the development of the Q-side.
moves.7... Bxe3: To avoid losing material. If 8 PxB NxN (or QxN) keeps the balance.
moves.8. Nxe7: A game that had been fairly tranquil, with relatively normal development and exchanges until now...
